about.description: A tech fan and enthusiastic programmer.
about.description2: I am located in Buenos Aires, Argentina. I have a great passion for creating and building dynamic and user-friendly websites and apps. With my problem-solving skills and attention to detail, I'm able to troubleshoot and debug complex issues, ensuring that the projects are delivered on time and to the highest quality. I'm a team player and enjoy collaborating with others to find creative solutions to challenges.

portfolio.title: Some of my most outstanding projects so far.

projects.1Title: Informative website featuring multiple pages that showcase a wide range of vehicles with detailed descriptions, specifications, and images, providing users with an engaging and comprehensive browsing experience.
projects.2Title: Web platform that connects property owners and buyers interested in the purchase and sale of fields.
projects.3Title: Portfolio for the Wamnet agency. Informative single-page website with multiple animations and smooth transitions.
projects.4Title: System for managing mutual affiliate control. It allows registering new affiliates, editing their information, and tracking payments made.
4Features: Users with different roles and permissions
Generation of digital credential in pdf
projects.5Title: E-commerce dedicated to the purchase of books, offering a wide variety of titles in different genres and authors, with detailed descriptions and payment options via bank transfer and Mercadopago.
projects.6Title: System for placing product orders to factory production. It allows managing customers, products, stock, and orders.
6Features: Users with different roles and permissions
Order review by administration before passing to production
projects.7Title: Informative website showcasing different product variants with detailed descriptions, specifications in tables, and images.
projects.8Title: Web platform showcasing different variants of agricultural machines for purchase, also allowing users to submit their own models for sale to be quoted and published.
projects.9Title: E-commerce dedicated to the purchase of fictitious technological products, with detailed descriptions and Stripe payment gateway.

services.title: Services
services.description: These are the services I offer.
services.mobile: Your site will display properly on any device, including desktop computers, tablets and mobile phones.
services.design: A good and attractive web design helps you keep your leads on your site, which is the digital face of your business.
services.develop: I specialize in the development of websites, mobile applications and custom systems.
services.ecommerce: I can create fully functional online stores where the user can make transactions.
services.performance: A fast and well-functioning website is crucial. High performing sites attract and retain users.
services.seo: I will optimize your site with intelligent Search Engine Optimization strategy to generate leads.
